title: Land with an old house for sale
details:
This grand house is located in a prime residential area in Colombo 7. The property is built on 30.7 perches and offers 5500 sq.ft of living space and is spread over two floors. The property consists of 7 bedrooms (three ensuites), 7 bathrooms, formal sitting & dining room, family/TV room, kitchen with pantry, landscaped terrace, and lounge.
